name: QuAC (Question Answering in Context)
summary:
_âš  Use card with caution_
A dialogue-style QA dataset with 13,594 information-seeking dialogs (98,407 questions) based on Wikipedia articles.
notes: In each dialog, a student poses a sequence of freeform questions to learn about a hidden Wikipedia text, and a teacher answers by providing short excerpts from the text. Questions are often open-ended, unanswerable, or context-dependent. The dataset includes teacher's dialogue acts and answer summaries for some turns.
